event_text: During the Gathering, m_c makes a joke at o_c's expense, hoping to hurt their feelings. The plan backfires, though, when o_c's leader finds more humor than offense in it.
During the Gathering, m_c flatters o_c to no end. By the end of the night, o_c's leader seems more annoyed at the attention than grateful.
During the Gathering, m_c attempts to make double-pawed comments about o_c's leader. Their leader, however, either doesn't care or is too oblivious to notice.
During the Gathering, m_c cozies up to the o_c leader in an attempt to get in o_c's good graces. They don't seem very receptive, though.
During the Gathering, m_c makes scathing comments about o_c. o_c's leader is quite blatantly ignoring {PRONOUN/m_c/object} though.
During the Gathering, m_c tries to make overtures of peace with o_c. o_c's leader seems far from interested and, in fact, seems to take further offense.
